name: Lunar Blessing
description: You bless the surrounding area with the light of a crescent moon. For the duration, when an allied creature (including yourself) starts its turn within 100 feet of you, they regain 2d4 + MOVE hit points and are cured of any negative Status Conditions.
higherLevels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
